document_data.mainbody:
aron Callem Bormul was a Lord and a senior member of the noble patriar Bormul family of Baldurs Gate and a member of the Parliament of Peers in the late 15 century DR.
Callem was a handsome human man with a light skin tone, dark eyes, long black hair, and a trimmed black short beared. Callem wore an expensive ensemble, gray in color, decorated with golden trim and a golden necklace.
In the , shortly before the armies of the Cult of the Absolute attacked the city of Baldurs Gate, Baron Callem Bormul was a Parliamentarian of the Gate and voted in support of crowning lowborn Lord Enver Gortash as the citys Archduke. Callem was present for Gortashs coronation that took place in the audience hall of Wyrms Rock. Following the coronation, he proudly proclaimed his support for Gortash accession, stating that Balduran himself would be proud of the new Archduke.
